Name: team_must_have_scrum_master
Description: Teams must have a Scrum Master assigned

Name: product_owner_must_manage_backlog
Description: Product Owners must manage the Product Backlog

Name: sprint_must_have_goal
Description: Sprints must have a defined goal

Name: sprint_retrospective_must_have_improvement_actions
Description: Sprint Retrospectives must have improvement actions

Name: development_snapshot_must_have_test_status
Description: Development Snapshots must have a test status

Name: project_must_have_start_date
Description: Projects must have a start date

Name: sprint_must_have_start_and_end_date
Description: Sprints must have start and end dates
